content:
Hi FHIR Chat,
I wanted to announce our FHIR native low-code suite. We offer several tools to make building on FHIR easier
including a Questionnaire WYSIWYG builder, Terminology Editor, OperationDefinition builder which allows you to write custom code for your app, An ImplementationGuide creator, and a way to publish in one click your Questionnaires as a Smart on FHIR application.
You can see a demo of our product at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g0XnLWCYmNI&feature=youtu.be
To register visit https://suite.augolit.app/ we're doing a closed release right now but if you register we will get back to you soon. Feel free to message me with any questions.
Best,
Ralph
